categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members
Category:Imperial Navy personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Ryenne was a Human engineer who was a member of the Imperial Navy for five years before becoming a resistance fighter on an backwater planet. Ryenne's group joined with the Rebel Alliance to raid the Imperial communications hub at Sunfall Peak.

Ryenne appears in the opening short story of the Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2014. Ryenne was also later used as a player's character in an example of gameplay given later in the book.
